name: Sk8terboi And This Cruel World
description:
Sk8terboi And This Cruel World

Made for the eighth ScoreSpace jam, Sk8terboi And This Cruel World is a revolutionary masterpiece of technology featuring a world-shattering 9 enemies and one entire level. Use the left and right arrows to balance Sk8terboi, and type out the various words hurtling towards you to slow your fate.  

Made in Unity.
